org.hibernate.search.backend.impl.jgroups

Interface NodeSelectorStrategyHolder


  • public interface NodeSelectorStrategyHolder
    Contains the NodeSelectorStrategy selected for each index, or returns the default one. Chosen strategies can be changed at any time. Implementors need to be threadsafe.
    Author:
    Sanne Grinovero (C) 2012 Red Hat Inc.
